# App.view.xml

```xml
<mvc:View
	controllerName="ns.manageproductsneo.controller.App"
	displayBlock="true"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Shell>
		<App id="app"
			busy="{appView>/busy}"
			busyIndicatorDelay="{appView>/delay}"/>
	</Shell>
</mvc:View>
```
